channel.title: I have an Ubuntu vps how do i get my server 24/7?
channel.description:
I have setup my server on my vps and I can run it via a shell script with the following:
[b]!#bin/bash cd && cd noobscape && java server[/b]
To run it 24/7 I need to turn that into a service.
How to do that?
Please help!
